json.text: Around the world,
tax authorities now require businesses to provide tax information in standard electronic formats.
They use analytical technologies to review the data,
plan their audits, and carry out enforcement.
A proactive approach to Tax Analytics can help address this growing area of tax risk management.
Deloitte is leading the way by helping clients through this transformation.
We take a broad approach to Tax Analytics, leveraging data and initiatives from across the business.
We show you how to use that data to create insights,
make fact-based decisions, improve operational efficiency, and drive strategy.
Analytics allows you to think differently about tax issues.
It lets you use large amounts of very granular data in new way.
This leads to more fact-based decision making for both tax planning and tax risk management.
Deloitte's approach emphasizes the use of common data sets and visualization tools.
This helps you draw together multiple areas of the business and leverage information in new ways.
Our approach is a sort of hub-and-spoke type of system,
where different departments can access a central data source for all their tax information.
This eliminates silos, increases data accuracy, and increases transparency across the organization.
Deloitte's approach also focuses on operational efficiency,
with greater access to granular tax data and by visually depicting trends,
you can highlight potential tax opportunities and risks, much faster.
One of our Deloitte clients was reviewing vendor invoices on a monthly basis over a certain threshold,
the effort that this took included requiring two people,
two weeks of each month.
With tax Analytics, the effort to review every transaction for that company has been reduced down to just a few hours.
Deloitte is a recognized leader in Analytics with proven ability to execute.
We have tax technologists around the world who specialize in tax data extraction and analysis.
A remarkably diverse group of non-tax Deloitte professionals also bring relevant knowledge, skills, and experience.
Increased globalization, new regulatory demands, and evolving technology
are driving businesses to transform today.
Tax Analytics can help you navigate this complex environment.
For more information visit our Tax Analytics website.
